rws_interface module¶

class rws_interface.RWSInterface(rws_server_address, username='Default User', password='robotics')¶

Bases: object

Implements a simple interface for a user who aims to build his/her own application.

It contains documented methods, each having a name corresponding to what it does.

close_http_session()¶
get_controller_actions()¶

Starts a RAPID execution

start_rapid_execution(regain='continue', execmode='continue', cycle='once', condition='none', stopatbp='disabled', alltaskbytsp='false')¶

Starts a RAPID execution

Parameters:
  • regain – [‘continue’, ‘regain’, ‘clear’]
  • execmode – [‘continue’, ‘stepin’, ‘stepover’, ‘stepout’, ‘stepback’, ‘steplast’, ‘stepmotion’]
  • cycle – [‘forever’, ‘asis’, ‘once’]
  • condition – [‘none’, ‘callchain’]
  • stopatbp – [‘disabled’, ‘enabled’]
  • alltaskbytsp – [‘true’, ‘false’]

Starts a RAPID execution from a production entry

Parameters:

  • usetsp – [‘normal’, ‘alltsk’]
